description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Currency_Rate_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Currency_Rate_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Currency_Rate_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing Currency Rate Type

Currency_Rate_Type_Data.description: Currency Rate Type ID. This is the Currency Rate Type unique identifier
Free form text field for Currency Rate Type Description

validation.description: Enter a unique currency rate type description. The description you entered is already in use.

Currency_Rate_Type_Data.description: Boolean attribute indicating if this rate type is the default Currency Rate Type. Only one Currency Rate Type may be the default.
